comments.creator: markh@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: test_ext_storage.js has one particular test which isn't really an API test, but rather a test of the specific kinto implementation. It's probably cleaner - particularly for bug 1623245 - if that test is moved into test_ext_storage_sync.js.
